Sorry one last question- 
Are these mods up to date?
Can you give details of your Nexus Mod Manager setup - things we may need to do inorder to get this mod setup to run properly. 
For example, you list SkyRe ~ Do you use ALL of the SkyRe options when activating the mod in the Mod Manager. 
If a user activates and selects SkyRe Races for instance will this lead to a conflict with; Gender and Race Heights & Lunari Race?
Details like this are important if the user is going to be able to play the game without it constantly crashing and/or being bugged to shit.

I wonder if it is possible to give us a .txt or .temp file for nexus mod manager or something along these lines so that this program can replicate your setup and we wouldn't need to jump through hoops and have to read 85 Mod instructions inorder to implement this properly.
this is pretty much useless without a working tutorial
